casebody.data:
Arthur F. SMALLFIELD, Appellant, v. HOME INSURANCE COMPANY OF NEW YORK, a corporation, Appellee. No. 15935. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. Sept. 15, 1958. Rehearing Denied Oct. 27, 1958. See also 244 F.2d 337. Louis Elowitt, Los Angeles, Cal., for appellant. Thomas P. Menzies, James O. White, Jr., Los Angeles, Cal., for appellee.

Before DENMAN, ORR and POPE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
